CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Signatures"), NOT(ISNULL(Apttus_CMDSign__DocuSignEnvelopeId__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Apttus_CMDSign__DocuSignEnvelopeId__c)) ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_DocuApi__DocuSignEnvStatusByEnvId?envelopeparentid="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__CheckStatus","Check eSignature Status"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Check eSignature Status
